title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for x=4

1 point is earned for relative maximum

1 point is earned for the justification

f'(x)=0 at x=4

f'(x)>0 for 0<x<4

f'(x)<0 for x>4

Therefore f has a relative maximum at x=4.
descriptions:
The student response earns none of the following points:

1 point is earned for x=4

1 point is earned for relative maximum

1 point is earned for the justification

f'(x)=0 at x=4

f'(x)>0 for 0<x<4

f'(x)<0 for x>4

Therefore f has a relative maximum at x=4.

The student response earns one of the following points:

1 point is earned for x=4

1 point is earned for relative maximum

1 point is earned for the justification

f'(x)=0 at x=4

f'(x)>0 for 0<x<4

f'(x)<0 for x>4

Therefore f has a relative maximum at x=4.

The student response earns two of the following points:

1 point is earned for x=4

1 point is earned for relative maximum

1 point is earned for the justification

f'(x)=0 at x=4

f'(x)>0 for 0<x<4

f'(x)<0 for x>4

Therefore f has a relative maximum at x=4.

The student response earns all of the following points:

1 point is earned for x=4

1 point is earned for relative maximum

1 point is earned for the justification

f'(x)=0 at x=4

f'(x)>0 for 0<x<4

f'(x)<0 for x>4

Therefore f has a relative maximum at x=4.
